messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: My local issues are pensioners, council cutbacks, development of empty retail properties and housing. Our country has massive structural problems caused by poor governance including 1.4 million people on zero hour contracts, five million living below the poverty line and job security at an all-time low.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to an EU referendum.
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in EU fees. Instead, spend our cash in our country.

issues.brexitEurope: Say YES to an EU referendum. Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in EU fees. Instead, spend our cash in our country.

issues.governance: Poor governance mentioned as causing massive structural problems.
